snippet: The choice of a candidate without direct ties to a controversial detention and interrogation program may signal the new C.I.A. director’s aim to distance himself from it.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency director John O Brennan replaces woman who is acting head of agency's clandestine service; chooses candidate without direct ties to controversial detention and interrogation program, signaling his aim to distance himself from it.
lead_paragraph: The choice of a candidate without direct ties to a controversial detention and interrogation program may signal the new C.I.A. director’s aim to distance himself from it.

headline.seo: New Head of C.I.A.’s Clandestine Service Is Chosen
headline.main: New Head of C.I.A.’s Clandestine Service Is Picked, as Acting Chief Is Passed Over
headline.print_headline: New Head of C.I.A.’s Clandestine Service Is Picked, as Acting Chief Is Passed Over
